name: gmod 2D(very simple)
description:
i'm  doing this in the free version of construct  but once  i get the full version i could improve and add a lot more stuff in the game

WIP

controls

  • P - fullscreen 
  • WASD-move
  • V and B - fly,and quit flying 
  • 1 and 2 - switch items 
  • right click - freeze object
